    • validateInput

      private String validateInput​(String name, Validatable validator, boolean isEnum, Enum[] enumValues)
      method that validates the given input String using the given validating function
      Parameters:
      name - name of the field
      validator - validating function
      isEnum - true if the field is Enum value false otherwise
      enumValues - null if the field is enum else contains the values of the Enum
      Returns:
      value of the field converted to String
